"What is (are) spondyloepimetaphyseal dysplasia, Strudwick type ?","Spondyloepimetaphyseal dysplasia, Strudwick type is an inherited disorder of bone growth that results in short stature (dwarfism), skeletal abnormalities, and problems with vision.
